html:
** Shares of MAANG stocks - Meta Platforms FB.O, Apple AAPL.O, Amazon AMZN.O, Netflix NFLX.O and Alphabet Inc GOOGL.O - slide

** Microsoft's shares MSFT.O down 4% at $325.66 - set for their worst day in over a year

** FB down 0.8% at $331.9, AMZN falls 1.5% to $3,339

** AAPL down 0.8% at $174.29, but still on track to become the world's first $3 trln co by market value

** GOOGL down 2.3% at $2,849.15, while NFLX down 2.5% at $589.59

** S&P 500 .SPX and Nasdaq .NDX fell more than 1% each on Tuesday after data showed producer prices increased more than expected in November .N

** U.S. central bank also likely to signal faster wind-down of asset purchases, and thus, a quicker start to interest rate hikes to contain rapid rise in prices

** So far this year, MSFT up 53%, FB rose ~22%, GOOGL up ~66%, AMZN up ~4%, NFLX rose ~12% and AAPL rose ~32%, as of last close


(Reporting by Akash Sriram in Bengaluru)

(( Akash.Sriram@thomsonreuters.com ;))
